title: Bug 14943: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
description: Bug 14943: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends
OB: The Code Assist feature is not respecting the platform line ends.
EB: Code Assist should respect platform line ends and use CR/LF as appropriate.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Create a new class. 2. Add a method. 3. Define a local variable for an array.
